HealthScore.name: HealthScore
HealthScore.description: Represents a subject’s score for a specific score category.

Age.description: Age of the patient at the time of computation.

AgeBand.description: Patient’s age calculated into age bands.

AssessmentYear.description: Indicates the year the risk score is applicable to.

CareProgramEnrolleeId.description: Care Program Enrollee for which this score is computed.

ConditionCategoryCount.description: Specifies the number of applicable condition categories.

ConditionCategoryList.description: A comma separated list of condition categories that apply to the specified condition codes.

CurrentScore.description: The patient’s current score for the score category.

CurrentScoreDate.description: The date when the current score was derived.

Gender.description: Gender of the patient at the time of computation.

HierCondCategoryCodeList.description: The final HCC Codes that are applicable to the patient after applying the overriding logic.

IsSubjectDisabled.description: CMS disability status of the patient at the time of computation.

IsSubjectInstitutionalized.description: Indicates whether the patient is in an institution.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the HealthScore record.

PreviousScore.description: The previous score of the subject for the specified category. This field is automatically updated when with the previous value of the CurrentScore field when the score is updated.

PreviousScoreDate.description: The date when the previous score was calculated. This field is automatically updated with the previous value of the CurrentScoreDate field when the score is updated.

ScoreCategoryId.description: The score category that the score belongs to.

ScoreChangePercent.description: The degree of change between the current score and the previous score.

ScoredAccountId.description: The account that is the subject of the score.

ScoredContactId.description: The contact that is the subject of the score.

ScoredLeadId.description: The lead that is the subject of the score.
